code: import axios from"axios";import*as constants from"./constants";import{fromJS}from"immutable";axios.defaults.withCredentials=true;export var postArticleAction=function postArticleAction(success){return{type:constants.ADD_ARTICLE,success:success};};export var postArticle=function postArticle(title,content,imgUrl){return function(dispatch){axios.defaults.withCredentials=true;axios.post("http://35.229.221.230:3000/comment/create",{title:title,content:content,imageUrl:imgUrl}).then(function(res){dispatch(postArticleAction(1));}).catch(function(err){dispatch(postArticleAction(2));});};};
